apps.name: Altos Adventure
apps.localisedDescription: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding adventure. Travel across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins. If you have any trouble contact @rifty600 on telegram.

apps.name: Altos Odyssey
apps.localisedDescription: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless sandboarding journey. Travel across the beautiful dunes of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins. If you have any trouble contact @rifty600 on telegram.

apps.name: Mirarr
apps.localisedDescription: This is a movie app that aims to simplify the process of watching movies and TV shows.
